revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.cubietech.com/product-detail/cubieboard7/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Cubietech_Cubieboard_7 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Cubietech |model = Cubieboard |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 7 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Actions Semi;S700; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H26M41103HPR; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;KH25L4006EM1I-12G; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4E6E304EB-EGCF; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.07-g9eee9a9;; |stockos = Linux;3.10.52;Android 5.1;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA 3.0, Micro SD Card slot, |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 4 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 3-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.1 BLE, HDMI 1.4a, RTC w/ battery backup, IR receiver, 3.5mm TRRS, battery backup, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, LVDS, GPIO, |addchip = PMU Audio Subsystem;Actions Semi;ATC2603C;;1;,,, USB 3.1 to SATA 6Gb/s Bridge Controller;JMicron;JMS578;;1;,,, USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 Combo Switch;Pericom;PI3USB3102;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2017 |estprice = 98 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B074ZPBMSB |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6212 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43430; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Actions]]'' Semi S700 Quad-core ARM Cortex-A53 *GPU: ''Mali 450MP4'' *Memory: 2GB LPDDR3 *Onboard Storage: 8GB eMMC, TF card (max. 32GB) / MMC card slot, : SATA 3 port implemented via USB 3.0 switch and USB 3 to SATA controller
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/07/25/cubieboard7-board-powered-by-actions-semi-s700-processor-becomes-a-full-featured-devkit-with-dvk522-expansion-board/ ''Cubieboard7 Board Powered by Actions Semi S700 Processor Becomes a Full-Featured Devkit with DVK522 Expansion Board'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/open-source-sandwich-style-cubioaio-sbcs-tap-the-actions-s700-and-s500/ ''Open source, sandwich-style CubieAIO SBCs tap the Actions S700 and S500 SoCs'' on '''LinuxGizmos''' ]
==See also== *[[Cubietech Cubietruck]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard]] - ''Allwinner'' A10 1-cores ARM Cortex-A8 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 2]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 3]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz :Wi-Fi: [[Broadcom]] BCM4329, BT: [[Broadcom]] BCM40181, GbE [[Realtek]] RTL8211E *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 4]] - ''Allwinner'' A80 SoC (4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 and :4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 big.LITTLE), GPU: PowerVR G6230, Wi-Fi (2.4/5GHz) *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 5]] - ''Allwinner'' H8 8-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @2.0GHz :GPU: PowerVR SGX544 @700MHz, Toshiba TC358777XBG, Wi-Fi (2.4/5GHz) *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 6]] - ''Actions Semi'' S500 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 7]] - ''Actions Semi'' S700 4-cores ARM Cortex-A53
[[Category:English Documentation]]
